desc:
Upon dealing or taking damage @NumInstances@ times, Ghostly units send @NumSpectres@ spectres to haunt nearby enemies and heal @HealingPercent*100@% max Health every @TickRate@ seconds.

Haunted enemies take bonus damage for each spectre on them, and pass spectres on death.

(@MinUnits@) @DamagePercent*100@% per spectre
name: Ghostly

desc:
When you lose a fight, gain Luck. The more fights in a row you lose, the more Luck you get.

Lose Luck when you win.

(@MinUnits@) Roll a die; in that many player combats, hold a Festival where you may convert your Luck into rewards.
(@MinUnits@) Heal @Heal@ player health at the start of each player combat.
@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT11_Trait_Fortune7Tooltip@

Each Festival, roll a new die.
name: Fortune

desc:
Change which Lover takes the field depending on whether they are placed in the front or back 2 rows.

When the fielded Lover casts, the other provides a bonus effect.

Front: Altruist Rakan
Back: Trickshot Xayah
name: Lovers

desc:
(@MinUnits@) Reapers' Abilities can critically strike and they gain @CritChance*100@% Critical Strike Chance.
(@MinUnits@) Additionally, Reapers bleed enemies for @BleedDamage*100@% bonus true damage over @Duration@ seconds.
name: Reaper

desc: Place in the back two rows to get Trickshot, place in the front two rows to get Altruist!
name: Trickshot/Altruist

desc:
The moon illuminates hexes, Shielding units placed in them at the start of combat.

Umbral units in illuminated hexes execute low Health enemies.

(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield; @DesireExecuteThreshhold@% Health execute
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield; @DesireExecuteThreshhold@% Health execute. More hexes are illuminated.
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield and illuminate the whole board
(@MinUnits@) Executed enemies have a @DesireExecuteRewardPercent*100@% chance to drop loot; @DesireExecuteThreshhold@% Health execute
name: Umbral

desc:
Dryads gain Ability Power and @StartingHealth@ Health. Each enemy death grants permanent additional Health.

(@MinUnits@) @AP@ %i:scaleAP%; @HealthPerCompost@ %i:scaleHealth% per enemy death

(Total health: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_DryadHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%)
(Enemies killed: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_DryadCompost@)
name: Dryad

desc:
Combat start: Allies in the front 2 rows gain Omnivamp. Allies in the back 2 rows gain Ability Power.

(@MinUnits@) @Omnivamp*100@% Omnivamp, @APAmount@ %i:scaleAP%
name: Sage

desc:
Arcanists gain Ability Power and grant Ability Power to allies.

(@MinUnits@) @TeamAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% to all allies.
(@MinUnits@) @ArcanistAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% for Arcanists; @TeamAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% for others
(@MinUnits@) @ArcanistAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% for Arcanists; @TeamAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% for others
(@MinUnits@) @ArcanistAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% for Arcanists; @TeamAbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP% for others
name: Arcanist

desc:
Gain unique Inkshadow items. Inkshadow champions gain @PercentBuff@% bonus damage and damage reduction.

(@MinUnits@) @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Inkshadow_Item1@
(@MinUnits@) @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Inkshadow_Item2@ and @IncreasedPercentBuff@% more bonus damage and damage reduction
(@MinUnits@) @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Inkshadow_Item3@ and @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Inkshadow_Item4@
name: Inkshadow

desc:
Altruists heal the lowest Health ally for @PercentDamageToHeal*100@% of damage they deal. Your team gains Armor and Magic Resist.

(@MinUnits@) @Resists@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%
name: Altruist

desc:
The Artist paints the champion you place in a special bench slot. Get a 1-star copy of the champion placed there when the Artist's work is complete.

Rounds to Complete = Unit Cost
name: Artist

desc:
Your team gains @BaseDamageAmp@% bonus damage, plus more based on your level.

After combat, store @BaseAmountXP@ XP in a Soul Core. Sell the Core to claim the XP.

(@MinUnits@) @DamageAmpPerLevel@% damage per level

(Current bonus: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Exalted_CurrentBonus@%).

Each game a different set of units is Exalted.
name: Exalted

desc:
Heavenly units grant unique stats to your team, increased by their star level and each Heavenly unit in play.

(@MinUnits@) @HeavenlyBonus*100@% bonus.

Kha'Zix -  %i:scaleCrit% @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Heavenly_Crit@%
Malphite -  %i:scaleArmor% %i:scaleMR% @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Heavenly_Defenses@
Neeko -  %i:scaleHealth% @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Heavenly_Health@
Qiyana -  %i:scaleAD% @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Heavenly_AD@%
Soraka -  %i:scaleAP% @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Heavenly_AP@%
Wukong -  %i:scaleAS% @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Heavenly_AS@%
Emblem -  Omnivamp @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT11_Trait_Heavenly_Omnivamp@%
name: Heavenly

desc:
After casting, Porcelain champions boil, gaining Attack Speed and taking less damage for @Duration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @AS*100@% %i:scaleAS%; @DR*100@% reduced damage
name: Porcelain

desc:
Duelists gain Attack Speed on each attack, stacking up to @MaxStacks@ times.

(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeedPercent*100@% %i:scaleAS%
(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeedPercent*100@% %i:scaleAS%
(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeedPercent*100@% %i:scaleAS%; Duelists take @DamageReduction*100@% less damage
(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeedPercent*100@% %i:scaleAS%; Duelists take @DamageReduction*100@% less damage
name: Duelist

desc:
After @FirstDelay@ seconds of combat, the Dragon strikes the board, dealing true damage to enemies and granting all allies Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

(@MinUnits@) @TrueDamageHPRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth% damage, @AttackSpeedBuff*100@% %i:scaleAS%.
(@MinUnits@) @TrueDamageHPRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth% damage, @AttackSpeedBuff*100@% %i:scaleAS%.
(@MinUnits@) @TrueDamageHPRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth% damage and Stuns for @StunDuration@ seconds.
(@MinUnits@) @TrueDamageHPRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth% damage, @AttackSpeedBuff*100@% %i:scaleAS%.
name: Dragonlord

desc:
Your team gains @TeamBonusHealth@ maximum Health. Bruisers gain additional maximum Health.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusPercentHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusPercentHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusPercentHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusPercentHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth%; Every @RefreshSeconds@ seconds, Bruisers deal @SlamPercentHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth% bonus physical damage on their next attack.
name: Bruiser

desc:
Trickshots' abilities ricochet. Each ricochet deals a percentage of the previous bounce's damage.

(@MinUnits@) @MaxBounces@ ricochet; @PercentDamage*100@% of previous damage
(@MinUnits@) @MaxBounces@ ricochets; @PercentDamage*100@% of previous damage
name: Trickshot

desc:
Hover one Fated unit over another to form a pair and unlock a Fated Bonus. Your pair gains @PairHPBonus*100@% %i:scaleHealth%.

(@MinUnits@) Pair gets the Fated Bonus.
(@MinUnits@) All Fated champions get @BondIncreasePercent*100@% of the Fated Bonus
(@MinUnits@) All Fated champions get @BondIncreasePercent*100@% of the Fated Bonus
(@MinUnits@) All Fated champions gain @BondIncreasePercent*100@% of EVERY Fated Bonus
name: Fated

desc:
Every @TickRate@ seconds, your units gain Mana.

(@MinUnits@) @TeamMana@ %i:scaleMana% to all allies.
(@MinUnits@) @InvokerMana@ %i:scaleMana% to Invokers; @TeamMana@ %i:scaleMana% to others.
(@MinUnits@) @InvokerMana@ %i:scaleMana% to Invokers; @TeamMana@ %i:scaleMana% to others.
name: Invoker

desc: Every @CastCount@ casts, Wukong grows his weapon, modifying his Abilities.
name: Great

desc:
Innate: Snipers gain @HexRangeIncrease@ Attack Range.

Snipers deal more damage to targets farther away.

(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageIncrease@% damage per hex.
(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageIncrease@% damage per hex.
(@MinUnits@) @PercentDamageIncrease@% damage per hex. Snipers gain an additional @BonusHexRangeIncrease@ Attack Range.
name: Sniper

desc:
Mythic champions gain Health, Ability Power, and Attack Damage.

After 4 player combats, they become Epic, increasing the bonus by @Multiplier*100@%.

(@MinUnits@) +@HealthPct*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @AP@% %i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAD%
(@MinUnits@) +@HealthPct*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @AP@% %i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAD%
(@MinUnits@) +@HealthPct*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @AP@% %i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAD%
(@MinUnits@) Instantly become Epic. The bonus is increased by @PrismaticMultiplier*100@% instead.
name: Mythic

desc: The first time the Spirit Walker drops below @RevivePercent*100@% Health, he unleashes the rage within, healing to full Health, gaining increased movement speed, and changing his Ability from Ram Slam to Tiger Strikes.
name: Spirit Walker

desc:
Wardens take less damage. For the first @Duration@ seconds of combat, they take an additional @StartOfCombatDRPercent@% less damage.

(@MinUnits@) @DRPercent@% less damage
name: Warden

desc:
Behemoths gain increased Armor and Magic Resist. Whenever a Behemoth dies, the nearest Behemoth gains @BonusPercent*100@% more for @Duration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @Defenses@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%
name: Behemoth

desc:
Storyweavers summon a Hero named Kayle and evolve her. Storyweavers gain max Health.

(@MinUnits@) Pick a supportive effect. @Health@ %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) Pick a combat effect. @Health@ %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) Pick a combat effect. @Health@ %i:scaleHealth%
(@MinUnits@) Ascend. @Health@ %i:scaleHealth%

Each Storyweaver star level increases Kayle's Health and Ability Power. Kayle gets @BonusASPerStage*100@% Attack Speed for each game Stage.
name: Storyweaver
